title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package; use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file import, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, prompt templates, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and embedding with Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks (CPU & GPU variants).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM summarization & continuation to your notes.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that exposes Ollama as an injectable service with guards and interceptors.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Multiplatform Kotlin SDK (JVM/Android/Native) for Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama sidecars in CI pipelines for LLM-based testing.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama (used internally by the CLI).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.
